explanation: No additional symbols are required. OS_PriorityRemap has an empty callee set (it calls no other functions). MISRA rule prohibits a function calling itself directly or indirectly, which requires at least one outgoing call path from the function that could loop back. Because OS_PriorityRemap does not call any functions (callees == []), there is no possible path from it to other functions and back, so it cannot be directly or indirectly recursive. The listed callers in the static call graph (OS_Posix_InternalTaskCreate_Impl, OS_TaskSetPriority_Impl, etc.) are not needed to determine recursion for OS_PriorityRemap because recursion would require OS_PriorityRemap to call them (which it does not).
